last_episode_to_air.name: A Handover Ritual
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tensions mount as Dapo puts the finishing touches on his story, Eniola stages a bold confrontation and a shocking press conference changes everything.

name: King of Boys: The Return of the King
original_name: King of Boys: O Retorno do Rei
overview: Alhaja Eniola Salami starts anew and sets her sights on a different position of power, fueled by revenge, regret and ruthlessness.

episodes.name: A King's Welcome
episodes.overview: Cleared of all charges, Eniola makes a triumphant return and a striking announcement. Meanwhile, a reporter starts digging for a high-stakes story.

episodes.name: A Wounded Lion Is Still A Lion
episodes.overview: Dapo’s digging sparks concern in the newsroom, Eniola works to secure an endorsement and a marketplace run-in leads to a tense confrontation.

episodes.name: An Old Enemy
episodes.overview: As the campaign heats up, Eniola reflects on her faith and independence — and revisits a deal from the past to secure a bid for the future.

episodes.name: The Devil's Revenge
episodes.overview: A chilling return results in chaos and bloodshed. Elsewhere, Eniola takes part in a press conference and fields a string of questions from Dapo.

episodes.name: Walls Closing In
episodes.overview: Dapo chases the truth about hidden political connections, but an attack redefines risk and reward. Eniola's adversaries and allies are tested.

episodes.name: Trouble Sleep...
episodes.overview: On the heels of a political debate, Eniola's camp encounters mayhem. Dapo fights to see his son — and revisits a personal trauma.

episodes.name: A Handover Ritual
episodes.overview: Tensions mount as Dapo puts the finishing touches on his story, Eniola stages a bold confrontation and a shocking press conference changes everything.
